content.description: Erin's first first ascent. A classic. Sit start the right leaning left arete of the downhill side of the large block and make your way to the top. Tricky, delicate and somewhat powerful with a nice exposed topout. Â The downclimb is located to the left of this arete.
content.location: This one I scrubbed up pretty well, so it should be easily recognizable. Hike up the trail towards Vader Cliff and Waimea. Pass the Entrance Boulders of the Black Jacks and keep heading up the hill. A large block on the left will be passed shortly, this is the Trailside Boulder of the Entrance Boulders.Continue walking up the trail until a series of large boulders will be seen about 20 yards off to the left of the main trail. These boulders are house sized and shouldn't be missed if you are looking for them. "Victor for CEO" is found on the lower of the two giant blocks.

content.description: This is an absolute classic that quests up a slightly overhanging wall. *Disclaimer, it has been years since it has been climbed and needs a good scrubbing before if can fully be considered a classic.Sit start on the obvious sloping rail. Pull up and right to a good sidepull and surf back left to a couple of options for crimps, then follow the crack to the lip and top out. Now scramble up the slab following the path of least resistance. The lip is at about 15 feet but the top of the boulder is easily 25 feet, you shouldn't punt once on the slab, but it should be noted not to fall off the slab.
content.protection: 2-4 Pads, spotters, and not falling on the slab.
content.location: This is on the house sized boulder that is embedded into the hillside of the Little Bit fo Peace Area. The line is left of the arete in a little alcove.

content.description: Sit start matched on the large horizontal feature. Pull on and figure out a way to smash the sloping lip of the boulder. Once here go for the large horn and mantle. Short, sweet and peachy.
content.location: This problem is found at the center of the cluster, just below the Beaver Block and just uphill from the classic V1 arete Victor for CEO.

content.description: A secluded area found only 50 or 60 yards off of the main trail leading to Waimea. This area provides the climber with a few highballs to climb and to clean. Only a handful of problems have been done in this area thus far.
